Top-3 Similar Questions: so_41310196: Bash: bash script to download trimmed mp3 from youtube url
au_928583: extract a segment from some mp3 file
so_56088966: Quickly extract multiple frames from multiple videos
Top-3 Scripts:
so_41310196: mytrim() {
    local downloaded_file
    youtube-dl --extract-audio --embed-thumbnail --audio-format mp3 -o "%(title)s.%(ext)s" $1
    downloaded_file=$(youtube-dl --get-filename --extract-audio --embed-thumbnail --audio-format mp3 -o "%(title)s.%(ext)s" $1)
    ffmpeg -ss $2 -i "${downloaded_file}" -acodec copy -y temp.mp3
    mv temp.mp3 "${downloaded_file}"
}

au_964835: --playlist-start NUMBER

          Playlist video to end at (default is last)

su_594008: #!/bin/bash
FOLDER_SRC="/home/J/Music/TestBatchConv"
find "$FOLDER_SRC" -type f -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' myvid; do
  echo "Trying to convert $myvid"
  avconv -i "$myvid" -c:a libmp3lame -q:a 4 "${myvid%.*}.mp3" 2>/dev/null || echo "$myvid is not a valid file."
done
